English: single-elimination open tournament (the winner stays on until he is himself defeated)

e: `如~：「`這~`場~`歌唱~`擂臺賽~`因~`獎金~`豐富~，`吸引~`了~`許多~`人~`報名~`參加~。」
d.f: `搭~`臺~`所~`舉行~`的~`比賽~。`具有~`公開~`接受~`挑戰~`及~`單淘汰~`的~`比賽~`特質~。

English: single-elimination open tournament (the winner stays on until he is himself defeated)
